seniority_level.evidence: Title includes 'Data Engineer' without explicit seniority indicators, and minimum of 3 years experience is mentioned which aligns with mid-level roles in the IC hierarchy.

job_family.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer-Business Intelligence' and core responsibilities focus on reporting, visualization, and BI tools like Cognos.

sub_specialty.evidence: ETL/Data Integration tools (IBM InfoSphere DataStage, Azure Data Factory, Informatica PowerCenter) are required, and no explicit streaming tools are mentioned.

leadership_expectation.evidence: Responsibilities include developing and maintaining reports, troubleshooting, and debugging, but no explicit leadership or mentoring duties are mentioned.

primary_cloud.evidence: Multiple cloud platforms (AWS, Google Cloud, Azure) are mentioned in nice-to-have skills without a clear primary focus.

secondary_clouds.evidence: AWS, Google Cloud, and Azure are listed as preferred or nice-to-have skills.

processing_paradigm.evidence: ETL/Data Integration tools are required, and no explicit streaming or real-time processing tools are mentioned.

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestration tools like Airflow, Luigi, or cloud-native orchestrators are explicitly mentioned.

storage_layer.evidence: No explicit mention of data warehouse, lake, or lakehouse technologies beyond ETL tools.

remote_restriction.evidence: Location is specified as 'Pune, Maharashtra, India', indicating a regional restriction.

timezone_focus.evidence: No timezone requirements or team distribution details are mentioned beyond location.

relocation_required.evidence: No relocation package or requirement mentioned; role is based in Pune, India.

h1b_friendly.evidence: No mention of H1B sponsorship in the job posting or Pass 1 results.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Job posting specifies 'The resource should be full time MCA/M. Tech/B. Tech/B.E.', implying work authorization is already settled, not student visas.

citizenship_required.evidence: No discussion of citizenship or green card requirements in the job posting or Pass 1 results.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type is stated as 'full_time' in Pass 1 results, and benefits are typically associated with W2 roles.

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits are mentioned in the job posting or Pass 1 results.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No explicit or implied career growth paths or tracks are mentioned in the job posting.

mentorship_signals.evidence: Job posting mentions developing and maintaining a strong working relationship with business and technical members of the team, which may include mentorship.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotion or advancement paths in the job posting.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal mobility, lateral moves, or team changes in the job posting.

career_tracks_available.evidence: No explicit career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) are mentioned in the job posting.

requirement_strictness.evidence: Pass 1 results show a clear distinction between must-have and nice-to-have skills, with strict qualifiers like 'required' and 'minimum of 3 years'.

scope_definition.evidence: Job description focuses on BI/DW projects, reporting, and visualization with well-defined responsibilities.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Minimum 3 years experience aligns with mid-level role expectations, and required skills are reasonable for this level.
